extension.description:
OSM Plugin

by Ariel Küchler

see https://www.kuechler.info/osm

Versions

  1. 1.1.0
    • It is possible to configurate the Retina detection of the Leaflet library. Default is activate.
    • Add possibility to configurate copyright hint and max zoom level.
  2. 1.0.6
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.7.1
  3. 1.0.5
    • leafletjs upgrade to 0.6.2
    • Possible to switch to Cloundflares CDNJS.
  4. 1.0.4
    • IE CSS usage,
    • not run on admin pages,
    • no backslash at Windows systems in HTML,
    • copyright and maximal zoom configurable,
    • better code
  5. 1.0.3
    • leaflet 0.4.5
  6. 1.0.2
    • Bugfix "+" to "." String concat
  7. 1.0.1
    • better code
  8. 1.0.0
    • initial version, leaflet 0.4
